page.title: 12Clubs in the Wolfords
page.content: Todenham village revolves round the Farriers Arms - weekly domino matches against Little Compton, and a newly founded 7-team darts league, serving a twenty mile radius. The annual village fete raises over a thousand pounds. The Village hall runs monthly Whist drives, dances and Christmas Bingo. Great Wolford has a conservative association, a thriving new bell ringing team and the Fox and Hounds serves good food and drink. Little Wolford Village hall runs Whist drives, and an annual auction and sponsered walk and has various lets for jumble sales, coffee mornings, parties, harvest suppers and elections. Both Wolfords join together for Women's Institute and over 60's activities and together with Todenham go outside for Mother's Union, Cubs, Brownies and Flower club.
